Dialogue.Value: It’s a cyber table with the,same style as the Shinki,family dinner table.
It makes you want to,invite friends over and,gather around the table.
It’s a pink-colored bookshelf.
Though the bookshelf itself,is pink，the e-books on the,shelves are ordinary books.
It’s a cyber computer.
Shanghai says she copied,the layout of Alice’s PC on,purpose.
It’s a bed with a cute-colored,comforter.
Shanghai took a quick nap,in the bed.
It’s a bed with a cool-colored,comforter.
Shanghai took a quick nap,in the bed.
It’s a widescreen,cyber computer.
It’s impossible to jack in from,the cyberworld，of course.
It’s a counter table with a,high-class image.
The vase of flowers on top,is a classy accent.
It’s a cool rack made of pipes.
A clear pane of glass makes,it look like the objects on it are,floating.
It’s a completely normal,cyber houseplant with no,unique qualities.
It’ll always be green，so,there’s no need to worry,about watering it.
It’s a cyber houseplant,teeming with colorful flowers.
Its roots and branches are,tightly packed and intertwined.
It’s a small decorative,houseplant.
For some reason，I can’t,put it up on top of a table.,I hope I don’t kick it.
It’s a decorative replica of,green mystery data.
These data show up every,time I jack in，but their,contents are random.
We might find treasure，,so let’s make a habit of,collecting them.
It’s a decorative replica of,blue mystery data.
They usually hold pretty,valuable stuff，but I can,only pick them up once.
They’re all over the,cyberworld，so let’s jack,in wherever we can!
It’s a decorative replica of,purple mystery data.
They’re locked，so they,usually have pretty good,stuff inside.
It’s a good idea to keep,some CrackTools with us，,just in case.
It’s a decorative replica of a,P-Cube.
It’s recommended to change,P-Codes often to prevent,break-ins.
If you suddenly can’t access,a friend’s HP，try asking for a,new P-Code.
It’s a shop counter used by,net merchants.
It has many features，such,as calculating prices，storing,payments，and more.
But it’s only a replica，so,I can’t use it to do business.
It’s a Request Board.
It’s a tall tree like the ones,outside on the side of the road.
The ball-shaped leaf,arrangment makes the,tree look kinda cute.
It’s a small tree like the ones,outside on the side of the road.
Its broad leaves folded over,each other make it look like,it’s floating.
It’s a small tree like,the ones outside on the,side of the road.
The small blooming flower,is quite lovely.
It’s a wooden bench like,the one in the park.
I hear that some people,use it as a bed or a table.
It’s a student’s desk，,like the ones at school.
They say it’s easy to leave,your things in the drawer by,mistake.
It’s a teacher’s desk.
It’s clearly too tall for any,students to use.
It’s a large glass table.
I’d feel bad if I left fingerprints,on it by accident.
It’s a decorative replica of a,NetBattle Machine.
NetBattlers test their skills on,real ones，like the one in the,Game Center.
It’s a bench to rest on.
Even in the cyberworld，it feels,oddly stiff and hard to sit on.
It’s a Sub Chip vending,machine.
It’s an uninspired office desk.
It’s highly practical，and,it’s also quite sturdy.
It’s a cyber air purifier.
The cyberworld has some,notion of air，so it’s nice to,have a purifier.
It’s a large screen with,an image of a folder.
I bet playing games on a,screen this large would,make a huge difference.
It’s a flat screen TV.
Even NetNavis want to watch,TV from time to time.
It’s a sofa modeled after,EvilEyeΣ，the large spherical,eye-shaped virus.
Looking at it this way，,I think I can understand why,Rika likes this virus.
It’s a fluffy futon.
Once you’re inside，it’s so,cozy that you can’t get out.
Shanghai got in the futon and,took a quick nap.
It’s a life-size model of a,FlowerTank virus.
Rika bought an old tank online,and decorated it like this.
It’s a model of the G7-Curtis，,the NetAgents’ latest mobile,weapon.
Even though it’s just a,papier-mache model，,it looks pretty authentic.
It’s a chandelier brimming,with splendor.
It seems like this would make,any room feel more noble.
It’s a luxurious bed，,fit for a princess.
Shanghai took a quick nap,in the bed.
It’s a round cyber table with,an expensive table cloth.
It’s perfect for practicing,magic tricks.
It’s a round cyber table with,an expensive table cloth.
The cyber cake on the table,is radiating sugary temptation.
It’s a round cyber table with,an expensive table cloth.
The wine on the table looks,vintage，but does cyber,wine actually age....?
It’s a round cyber table with,an expensive table cloth.
A nice scent is faintly wafting,from the vase on the table.
It’s a round cyber table with,an expensive table cloth.
The juicy chicken on the,table is making me drool,instinctively.
It’s a luxurious cyber sofa,that draws you in with its,extravagent yet cozy fabric.
It seems like you’d get a,better night's sleep on this,than a lumpy old mattress.
It's a tree like the ones on the,sides of the roads in Engelles.
I hear most of these trees are,actually apple trees，which,bear a lot of fruit in October.
It’s a bronze cyber statue,of Yamaze Nadu.
Even though it’s just a replica，,it’s overflowing with the same,wit and dignity as the original.
It’s an Engelles bus stop.
Engelles is in Eurica，so,fully self-driving buses are,becoming commonplace.
The bus stops regulate the,self-driving buses and other,such systems.
It’s a Nekodolphin plush.
Its unrivaled cuteness,fully healed Shanghai.
It’s a cyber cardboard box,for use with Interiors.
Different Navis use it to,store different things.
It’s a cyber cardboard box,for use with Interiors.
Only the original owner,would know what the stuff,in the bottom of the box is.
